item.description:
The Nutmeg Restaurant has a wonderful reputation, so I thought this would be a great restaurant to have dinner at next. And on a Saturday night, no less.

Come join us for a delighful dining experience while enjoying excellent food in a quiet yet relaxed atmosphere. This restaurant is located in a converted farm house done up in muted colors with friendly staff.

http://www.nutmegrest...

Directions: http://maps.google.co...

**IMPORTANT**
-Accurate Reservation numbers are VERY important to the restaraunt staff. This ensures that they have the right amount of people assigned to our tables, and that we have the best dining experience possible. If you RSVP yes and cannot attend, please take a moment and change your RSVP to a no.
-Please bring cash, if possible. This will make paying the bill much easier for yourself, and the staff waiting our tables.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Saturday Night out at The Nutmeg Restaurant, East Windsor
